title: Aatrox, Kha Zix or Fizz
body: I do not mind top, jg or mid so can u guys tell me which champ is more suitable plz

replies.body:
exactly how you laid them out in title, of the 3, aatrox top, kha jung, fizz mid.

Although i think the strongest of the roles at the moment are Trynd top, Xin Jungle, Brand mid
Aatrox jungle can be fun too =)
I win a vast majority of the games I play taking Aatrox top. Don't have the other two, but Fizz is definitely annoying to lane against mid.

> [{quoted}](name=Alkyan,realm=NA,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=TidrtRty,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-24T17:48:58.958+0000)
>
> I win a vast majority of the games I play taking Aatrox top. Don't have the other two, but Fizz is definitely annoying to lane against mid.

why not just get a good champ
